name: Drag & Box
description: Drag & Box is a game made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 51 game jam, with theme Every 10 seconds. You work in a very stressful environment, where every 10 seconds, an order shows up asking you for diverse items to send out. Try to pack as many items together as possible for your orders and don't forget the packing peanuts (fill)! Try to win as many points in 5 minutes! Or try the endless mode.
